author: Melissa Gilligan
title: Funeral on Friday for Mount Royal University instructor killed in plane crash near Calgary | Globalnews.ca
text:
February 24, 2017 9:01 am Updated: February 24, 2017 9:56 am Funeral on Friday for Mount Royal University instructor killed in plane crash near Calgary By Melissa Gilligan Online Reporter Global News 
Reynold "Reyn" Johnson is one of two people who died in a place crash west of Calgary on Feb. 13, 2017. CREDIT: Mount Royal University What is this?
